# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt structure at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid operational disruptions.

### Errors due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before starting operations.
- Regularly check the ingredient status of entities to avoid operational disruptions.

### Errors due to entities not being connected
- Ensure that steam engines are properly connected to the power grid before starting operations.
- Regularly check the connection status of entities to avoid operational disruptions.

### Errors due to entities not being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are properly plugged into the electric network before starting operations.
- Regularly check the connection status of entities to avoid operational disruptions.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a sufficient source of items before starting operations.
- Regularly check the source item status of entities to avoid operational disruptions.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
